# Finbot Poster Outline Template

Use this outline for P7.9 or related poster deliverables.

## Header

1. Title
2. Author(s)
3. Affiliation
4. Contact/Repo URL

## Section 1: Problem

1. Problem statement
2. Why it matters
3. Scope boundaries

## Section 2: Approach

1. Architecture summary
2. Methods/workflow diagram
3. Key design decisions

## Section 3: Results

1. Quantitative metrics table
2. Benchmark/validation highlights
3. Reliability/quality evidence

## Section 4: Health Economics/Impact (if applicable)

1. Use case summary
2. Decision-support implications
3. Limitations and caveats

## Section 5: Limitations

1. Known constraints
2. Threats to validity
3. Deferred work

## Section 6: Next Steps

1. Immediate roadmap items
2. Mid-term roadmap items

## Footer

1. QR code / repository link
2. Documentation link
3. Disclaimer
